meanings.sent1: She gave me specific instructions on how to bake the cake.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked for specific details about the project.
meanings.sent3: He was so specific about his dislike for mushrooms, he wouldn't even look at them.
meanings.sent4: Her specific taste in music made her stand out from the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The specific shade of blue in the painting caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Relating to a particular individual or thing
meanings.sent1: The detective was looking for a specific suspect in the case.
meanings.sent2: Each student had a specific desk assigned to them in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The cat had a specific spot on the couch where it loved to nap.
meanings.sent4: His specific choice of words made his apology sincere.
meanings.sent5: The specific smell of fresh bread filled the bakery every morning.

meanings.sent1: The scientist needed a specific measurement for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The tailor took specific measurements to ensure the perfect fit.
meanings.sent3: She had a specific routine for getting ready in the morning.
meanings.sent4: His specific timing for the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent5: The specific location of the treasure was finally revealed.
